analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SputnikPresale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x490780a4726fe319de81533f05b204b4e7ec59c1.sol#463-472):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x490780a4726fe319de81533f05b204b4e7ec59c1.sol#468)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/38/0x490780a4726fe319de81533f05b204b4e7ec59c1.sol#470-471)

SputnikPresale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x490780a4726fe319de81533f05b204b4e7ec59c1.sol#463-472) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(contributor,amount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x490780a4726fe319de81533f05b204b4e7ec59c1.sol#468)
